name: William Gruendler
text: The I-75 Perry  Pizza Hut we all know and love has undergone a bit of a facelift, making the interior of what must be one of the oldest Huts a bit more ... appetizing. Be sure to get there well before the cutoff two o'clock buffet time to enjoy the popular all you can eats. Expect pizza to be hot and tasty, as always.

name: Water Dragon
text: Order was carryout, this Pizza Hut offers a buffet for lunch. Pizza ingredients were fresh hot and ready. Order wasn't right on one Pizza and they corrected it immediately. Employees appear to be friendly and courteous . Overall the experience was good today

name: Mindy Misure
text: I'm so grossed out I feel it necessary to leave a bad review, which is not something I normally do. My husband and I stopped here on our drive home from Florida to Michigan to sit down for a quick dinner. We both had to use the restroom …More

name: abby cuevas
text: Loved the service at this location. Our waitress named "meme" was so funny and friendly and very helpful. The best service we have had during our vacation. Stopped here while traveling back home so glad we did.

name: Jack
text: I love pizza like everyone else in the world.....if this were the last pizza place in the world.....i would never eat pizza again! Worst customer service 5 times in a row. Can't say I didn't give them plenty of opportunities to do better. I have no clue how this place is still open. Seriously!!!

name: Julie Howard
text: phone rang nonstop with no one answering it. people who came in well after we did were getting their food. the waitress took it upon herself to add breadsticks to our order and charged us for them. our waitress also had her child sleeping …More

text: This location has horrible service each time we go back to give them a chance it's always something. Tonight I placed the order it was to be delivered by 10:20 PM. I called the manager stated that he would be here in 5 to 6 minutes which it …More

name: Rob Martel
text: Not very good service. We waited an hour just for appetizers. People that came in 20 mins after we did got there appetizers and pizza before we even got appetizers. Was not happy at all. At least the food was good once we finally got it.

name: xxckwxx
text: AVOID!!!! I've lived in Perry my entire life. This place was once good. Not anymore.  Never anything in the salad bar. I though I'd give it a shot today. I walked out because they didn't have ANY "in stock" that I wanted on the menu. Avoid!!! THIS COMES FROM  PERRY PERSON.

name: Phil Jackson
text: Called the store at 9:00 PM on a Wednesday night, the line rang for about a minute, then was picked up and immediately hung up on. Thinking maybe it was a phone issue, I called back. Same result, ringing, then picked up, hung up. Surely it …More

text: Good Place to eat pizza and Good Service,

name: tb
text: This place is very unprofessional.  They messed up my order and when I called they were going to credit my account.  Fast forward a month when I try to use the credit...it doesn’t exist.  I called was on hold over 20 minutes before I …More

text: I ordered large pepperoni pizza and order of breadsticks cost me $18.17. It was a delivery order. Opened my pizza i had 11 pieces of pepperoni 1 peice per slice well one slice had 2 pepperoni on it and breadsticks was cold.

name: Mike Pollard
text: Absolutely pathetic, do not waste your money. Upon arival lobby was un clean along with the buffet bar. They had no plates and no pizza. They only served one pizza at a time and the lobby was full of customers.  There was no pizza to eat and employees was rude. I would not recommend eating at this establishment

text: Love the food but they have a tendency to forget your sauce.

text: Although the individuals were cordial, my order was incorrect. I was asked to wait about 10 mins to remake my order. After waiting 10 mins in my car, my pizza was remade by the manager after I walked back into the store. Yes,  I saw him …More
